Doc: The specification of how a barrier option will trigger (that is, knock-in or knock-out) or expire based on the position of the spot rate relative to trigger level.

Source.Contents:
/#
   The specification of how a barrier option will trigger (that is, knock-in or knock-out) or expire based on the position of the spot rate relative to trigger level.
 #/
record FpML5.recordkeeping.CommodityBarrier {
  # The knock feature of a commodity barrier option.
  knock : string

  # In the case of barrier options where the option automatically expires and the barrier is breached in such a way to to result in a "knock-out" vent, this amount is paid to the the option holder so as to refund or rebate a portion of any premium paid.
  featurePaymentAmount : FpML5.recordkeeping.PositiveMoney?

  trigger : FpML5.recordkeeping.CommodityTrigger

}

knock.Doc: The knock feature of a commodity barrier option.
knock.Name: knock

featurePaymentAmount.Doc: In the case of barrier options where the option automatically expires and the barrier is breached in such a way to to result in a "knock-out" vent, this amount is paid to the the option holder so as to refund or rebate a portion of any premium paid.
featurePaymentAmount.Name: featurePaymentAmount
